name: places/ChIJF47lRJdZwokRTgJ6dutWLZI
formattedAddress: 2 5th Ave Ste 7, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2 5th Ave Ste 7, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text:
Amazing first experience working with Dr Seifferman and staff. Omer the office manager is super efficient and helpful. Dr Seifferman listened carefully and thoughtfully to my long and complicated right buttock pain history, maybe the first doctor to do so, and came up with a few possible causes. He explained his theories and even asked me which one resonated the most with me. We chose that as the starting point.  His plan is to methodically rule out/in various pain causing structures with nerve blocks. So far he is the first doctor to take my sacroiliac joint into consideration.
I am an orthopedic physical therapist and after meeting with Dr Seifferman have a ton of patients I want him to now see!

originalText.text:
I am not one to generally write reviews but if you or a loved one have pain, this is the one doctor you will wish you met years earlier.

I can’t say enough good things about Dr. Siefferman and every person I’ve encountered at his practice, Manhattan Pain Medicine. He is knowledgeable and thorough, has a wonderful bedside manner that can calm anxiety in one conversation, and has an extensive range of effective treatment options. He has taken my daughter, who had been suffering from chronic, unbearable pain, and a deterioration of her physical well-being, and begun to turn it around. There are multiple issues at play but with his broad knowledge, he was able to apply a holistic perspective that other doctors hadn’t, which enabled him to begin teasing apart the various issues at play. This understanding, along with several treatment options, gave us a renewed sense of hope.

Dr. Siefferman is astute, aware, and has a gentle way of sharing challenging information so it can be received without feeling judged. His compassion and concern for every aspect of a patient and their families’ well-being is palpable and this commitment feels shared by every person in his office. From intake with Omer, who comforted my anxiety and worked with me to relieve some of my financial concerns to the administrative assistant who schedules appointments, we feel welcomed and supported.

I am eternally grateful for the referral to Dr. Siefferman’s practice, Manhattan Pain Medicine, and the wonderful doctors we met there.  I can’t recommend this practice highly enough. Dr. Siefferman and Manhattan Pain Medicine have been true lifesavers, not only to my daughter who is no longer in chronic overwhelming pain but to the family who can breathe a sigh of relief.

originalText.text: As a visiting physician, I had the opportunity to observe Dr. Siefferman in practice. He goes above and beyond for his patients, helping them to understand the root cause of their pain. It was apparent that his patients appreciated his holistic approach to managing their pain. I highly recommend Dr. Siefferman to anyone looking for a thoughtful and holistic pain physician.

text.text: As a visiting physician, I had the opportunity to observe Dr. Siefferman in practice. He goes above and beyond for his patients, helping them to understand the root cause of their pain. It was apparent that his patients appreciated his holistic approach to managing their pain. I highly recommend Dr. Siefferman to anyone looking for a thoughtful and holistic pain physician.

originalText.text: He is the most caring and best pain doctor he takes his time to listen to you. I did not feel rush he took over one hour in the consultation. He is available via email or call 24/7 for questions. The office is clean and presentable.

originalText.text: I've trained with Dr. Jason Siefferman and have known him for over a decade now and I can attest that he is thorough, highly knowledgeable and an expert in his field.  If you're looking for a pain physician in Manhattan, I certainly do recommend him!
